about.title: Experienced Interim executive for Product Development & Engineering
about.text: As an interim executive, I support companies in stabilizing, transforming, and scaling the development and series production of their products, as well as their operational safety and reliability - drawing on solid aerospace expertise and international leadership experience at Airbus and Rolls-Royce in engineering, systems development, and project management. I am specialized in agile transformation, process optimization, change management, crisis resolution, and building high-performance teams. With my strategic mindset, deep technical expertise, and as a strong communicator I combine leadership excellence with engineering depth and transformation skills, even in higly relgulated industries. The result: reliable, safe, and defect-free products - with shorter time-to-market, lower product and service costs, and higher customer satisfaction.

project1.title: Aircraft Final Assembly Line Performance Improvement
project1.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
project1.text: Clients Initial Situation: At the production rate of 64 A330/A340 aircraft per year the on-time delivery was already for an extended period at 25%.  The company-wide continuous improvement program (CIP) did not bring the expected improvement.  The root-case was not clear.  The following year the production rate shall be scaled to 74 aircraft per year. Tasks:   * Improve the on-time-delivery from 25% to 100% * Identify causes, define measures and drive implementation * Support the head of the final assembly line and represent him in relevant boards (Airbus wide) * Overcome organizational and intercultural hurdles in an international environment Implemented Measures: * Identification of the most significant causes for the significant delays in the final assembly process ** Erroneous mounting points for the buyer furnished equipment  ** Damages to the aircraft structure, floor panels, cabin furnishing  ** High level of equipment claims with no-fault-found * Identification and implementation of improvement measures  ** Multiple correction of the mounting point installation tool ** Correction of quality issues in a supplying plant ** Introduction of protective measures for cabin installation and furnishing; improved transportation means ** Tailored support during equipment installation, improved allocation of equipment protective devices Achievements: * 100% on-time-delivery achieved after 10 months with parallel production rate scaling from 64->74 aircraft/year * Reduction of production related quality issues and claims by up to 75%

project2.title: Hybrid-Electric Propulsion Certification
project2.subtitle: Industrial Corporation, 350.000 Staff, EUR 76B Revenue
project2.text: I developed a strategic roadmap for Systems Safety, positioned the function at the core of the architecture, and integrated processes into ALM. Through competence building and cross-team networking, safety requirement definition time was cut by 75%, reducing certification risk and accelerating market entry.

project3.title: Engineering Reorganization for Growth
project3.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
project3.text: As Senior Manager, I designed a scalable engineering structure, redefined interfaces with programs and sales, and initiated the first company-wide Code of Conduct. Result: enabled growth for three new aircraft programs, improved cross-functional collaboration, and established a governance model adopted across divisions.

project4.title: Industrializing New Structural Technology
project4.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
project4.text: As Head of Transversal Engineering, I defined missing industrialization standards together with production and structures teams. Impact: 700 kg weight reduction and USD 500,000 unit cost savings per aircraft through robust standards implementation.

project5.subtitle: Aircraft Manufacturer, 100.000 Staff, EUR 70B Revenue
